column3:
数多の試練を克服し よくぞこの地へ
さあ最後の試練に挑むのだ
column4:
Welcome, hero. You have overcome many
trials to reach me. Now it is time to face
the final trial.

column3:
試練の場は複雑な迷宮
先ずは マップを手に入れよ
column4:
This trial is a complex labyrinth.
To start, you will need a map.

column3:
マップの情報は
奥に見える勇導石から入手するがよい
column4:
You may obtain map information from
the Guidance Stone.
